name: God of Chance
description:
Our submission to GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Roll of the Dice. 

You play as the God of Chance. The God of Certainty has launched an attack and sent minions to destroy the Nexus of Chance, the one artifact that is keeping the future of the world uncertain, thus giving its citizens free will to decide their own future. 

You must use Dice to defend the Nexus, because you are the God of Chance, so that's your weapon, obviously...

How to Play:

Mouse only! 
Click and drag on the Dice that appears in the bottom of the screen. Swipe the dice towards enemies and try to hit them!

Combine 3 or more of the same dice colour to 'Activate' their abilities: Fire, Thunder and Ice

If you lose the nexus, the Universe is doomed!
